introduction_markdown:
Resources are any items or areas that can be booked via a calendar. This guide will show you how to set up your first resource in Nexudus.

Some examples of resources include:

- **Meeting rooms, Boardrooms and Conference rooms**
- **Phone booths or private call pods**
- **Photo/video studios**
- **Materials or tools in a Makerspace**
- **Music rooms or soundproof booths**
- **Lockers**
- **Parking spaces**
- **Mailboxes**
- **Storage units**
- **3D printers**

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: Navigate to **Inventory > Rooms and Resources > Resource types**.
Click on the **Add resource type** button.
In the **Type name** field, enter the name of the resource type. For example, type `Small Meeting Rooms`.
Navigate to **Inventory > Rooms and Resources > Resources**.
In the **Resource name** field, enter the name of the resource. For example, type `Small Meeting Room 1`.
In the **Resource type** field, select the resource type you created earlier. For example, select `Small Meeting Rooms - Coworking Central Street`.
In the **Category** field, enter the category of the resource. For example, type `Meeting Rooms`.
Click on the **Select file** button to upload a photo of the resource.
Select the resource you created. For example, select `Small Meeting Room 1`.
In the **Price name** field, enter the name of the rate. For example, type `Small Meeting Rooms Hourly Rate`.
In the **Price** field, enter the price of the resource. For example, type `25` and select `USD` and `every hour`.

title: Setup First Resource
